name: earthiness
content:
earthiness noun [U]
(DIRECTNESS)
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of being open and direct, often in a way that refers to sex and the human body: I like the earthiness of her writing. This essentially Mediterranean music combines earthiness with an age-old elegance. See
earthy
More examplesFewer examplesHe captures the astonishing earthiness of this ancient epic.I was taken by his earthiness and his authenticity, which I find rare, living in Hollywood.She brings a wholesome earthiness to her role as his wife.
earthiness noun [U]
(LIKE EARTH)
(of food) the quality of being like earth or soil, usually in a pleasant way: The dish combines the sweet earthiness of beets with meaty lentils. I love the earthiness of the mushrooms and leeks together. See
earthy
More examplesFewer examplesa dish which managed to combine the earthiness of the artichoke and truffle with the freshness of the asparagusThe richness and earthiness of this dish was almost overpowering, and I could only eat half of it.a coffee with light acidity and a hint of nutty earthiness
